question: CAMPA Funds, that was seen in the economic stimulus package, is associated with which Union Ministry?
option3: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
explanation:
Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority (CAMPA) was set up under Environment Ministry to promote afforestation activities as a way of compensating for forest land diverted to non-forest uses.
In the economic stimulus package, it was proposed that plans worth Rs 6000 crores of CAMPA funds will be approved shortly. The funds will be used for afforestation and plantation works, forest protection and job opportunities in urban, semi-urban and rural areas and for Tribals /Adivasis.
